name: Panzer (itch) (Shivansh Ahuja)
description:
This project was developed in 3 days for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2  

You are stuck in a tank in outer space and your objective is to destroy as many golems as possible!  

CREDITS: MODELS , ANIMATIONS and some SOUND EFFECTS are self made and rest are taken from unity asset store 

Made in a team of three :-

1. @shivansh.ahuja - Programmer

2. @MemesrHeaven - 3D Artist

3. @Bhavukarora03 - UI Designer

Controls:

W A S D to MOVE 

SPACE to BREAK

LEFT MOUSE BUTTON  to SHOOT

Hope you all enjoy it!
